name: Urban Warfare Strategies
description: Tactics for engaging in combat within densely populated urban environments.

cards.title: Close-Quarters Battle Tactics
cards.description: Effective movement and engagement techniques for combat in confined spaces.
cards.bulletpoints: Utilize cover, room clearing maneuvers, and cornering strategies
cards.summaryText: Emphasizes cover usage, precision room clears, and angle control in cramped fights.

cards.title: High-Risk Extraction Operations
cards.description: Executing personnel extractions and hostage rescue missions in hostile urban zones.
cards.bulletpoints: Coordinate fireteams, use non-lethal options, and execute timed extractions
cards.summaryText: Covers synchronized teams, controlled force, and time-bound rescue sequencing in cities.
